WotD35 - Paradoxically

Aug 30, 2015

If something seems paradoxical, surely that's a sign that our understanding hasn't caught up with reality. Finding something that seems altogether both true and contradictoryÂ is a sign that we don't understand the situation. But that's a good thing, as physicist, Niels Bohr said:

How wonderful that we have met with a paradox. Now we have some hope of making progress.

Our brains love to unpick the uncertainty, and so finding something we don't understand can help us to move to a new level of understanding.

Today's #PositivePostIt word is #Paradoxically #Thinking #Blog http://helenwalker.net/2015/08/30/wotd35-paradoxically/
